Title: Croatia’s HEP seeks up to three LNG cargoes for delivery in December-February 2024
Description: Croatia’s state-owned utility Hrvatska Elektroprivreda (HEP) has issued a tender to buy up to three LNG cargoes for delivery between December and February 2024 to the 2.13 mtpa Krk LNG receiving terminal in Omisalj. The tender closes on Jul. 11 at 12 pm Central European Time, with offers expected to remain valid until Jul. 13.
Author: CK
